summary: How does the TSA ensure that explosives aren't hidden in the cargo holds of commercial aircraft? One part of the effort is inspecting passenger and cargo airlines, for example, to see how they screen cargo. Another is assessing security at foreign airports. Our analysis of 2012-2017 data shows TSA found violations related to air cargo security in 16% of its airline inspections 25% of its...
title: Aviation Security: TSA Uses a Variety of Methods to Secure U.S.-bound Air Cargo, but Could Do More to Assess Their Effectiveness
